keyQuotes.quote: HubSpot Academy was the catalyst, the place where I could absorb like a sponge. Without HubSpot Academy, there wouldn't be a George B. Thomas brand. It would be impossible.
keyQuotes.context: On the importance of HubSpot Academy to his career

keyQuotes.quote: The moment he landed in Boston and entered his first HubSpot INBOUND event, something fundamentally changed in his brain. The humanity-focused message of HubSpot spoke to his soul and purpose.
Humans don't buy from brands. They buy from other Humans. Without authenticity, empathy, and purpose, you're leaving relationships and revenue on the table.
A walking knowledge base of everything inbound and HubSpot.
I definitely recommend George as a top notch marketer, video creator, HubSpot expert and all around good person to know.
